nodes.text: The Telos was a Valor-class cruiser serving in the Republic fleet during the Great Galactic War and the subsequent Cold War. During the latter it served as the flagship of the First Expeditionary Fleet for the Republic forces.

It would later serve as the command ship of Jedi Master Oteg during the raid of the Imperial compound on Taral V in order to gain a Gree computer to chart a course into the Maelstrom Nebula. It would come to help the Republic strike team by shooting down Imperial bombers trying to destroy the complex. This ship along with the rest of the Expeditionary fleet jumped to the secret Imperial prison to rescue Jedi Master Revan as they held off the Imperial warships defending the station. The ship was saved by a tactical retreat during the fight.
